TextLibrary.Text: My master wishes me to give you a message. Stand before his Citadel and use the Sword that Lord Moarg gave you. Do this BEFORE you enter the Citadel. Go where the Sword points you, and you will learn the true nature of power.

My master wishes me to give you a message. Stand before his Citadel and use the Sword that Lord Moarg gave you. Do this BEFORE you enter the Citadel. Go where the Sword points you, and you will learn the true nature of power.

My master wishes me to give you a message. Stand before his Citadel and use the Sword that Lord Moarg gave you. Do this BEFORE you enter the Citadel. Go where the Sword points you, and you will learn the true nature of power.

My master wishes me to give you a message. Stand before his Citadel and use the Sword that Lord Moarg gave you. Do this BEFORE you enter the Citadel. Go where the Sword points you, and you will learn the true nature of power.
Right now, that sword is pointing straight at your heart!
Right now, that sword is pointing straight at your heart!
Right now, that sword is pointing straight at your heart!
Right now, that sword is pointing straight at your heart!
